messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

changed name and configuration of tm editorial support wednesday pm changed name configuration tm editorial hello please change tm editorial tm editorial technical requested by lead please also add kind regards specialist

message.reasoning:

I've been analyzing the provided ticket description. It seems to mention configuration changes related to "tm editorial," which initially made me think of "Administrative rights" or "Internal Project." But the mention of "name" and "configuration" is quite broad. I'm leaning toward "Miscellaneous" at this stage, as it's not clearly related to the other categories. I'm exploring further angles.
